verses.roman:
ei ta' kahiluṅ prabhura kīrtana-vilāsa
yebā ihā śune, haya caitanyera dāsa

synonyms: ei ta' kahiluṅ—thus I have explained; prabhura—of the Lord; kīrtana-vilāsa—pastimes in yebā—anyone who; ihā—this; śune—listens to; haya—becomes; caitanyera dāsa—a servant of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
translation: In this way I have explained the Lord's pastime of saṅkīrtana, and I bless everyone with this benediction: By listening to this description, one will surely become a servant of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
